name: Seeding Mass
description: A massive, mobile fungal growth that serves as both transport and weapon for the Thornbound Choir. It carries spores and warriors within its bulk, spreading the sacred rot wherever it moves.
abilities: Living Transport: This model can carry up to 3 friendly THORNBOUND CHOIR INFANTRY models. These models can disembark at any point during this model's movement, but must end their movement at least 3" away from this model.
Spore Cloud: When this model is activated, all models within 6" must make a Resolve test. Models that fail suffer -1 to their Movement and Toughness until the end of the round.
